26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_BLOCK_RANGE_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_BLOCK_RANGE_H__INCLUDED
28 
29 #include <TiledArray/range.h>
30 
31 namespace TiledArray {
32 
34 class BlockRange : public Range {
35  private:
36  using Range::data_;
37  using Range::offset_;
38  using Range::rank_;
39  using Range::volume_;
40 
41  Range::ordinal_type block_offset_ = 0ul;
42 
43  template <typename Index>
44  void init(const Range& range, const Index& lower_bound,
45  const Index& upper_bound) {
46  TA_ASSERT(range.rank());
47  // Check for valid lower and upper bounds
48  TA_ASSERT(std::equal(
49  lower_bound.begin(), lower_bound.end(), range.lobound_data(),
50  [](const size_type l, const size_type r) { return l >= r; }));
51  TA_ASSERT(
52  std::equal(upper_bound.begin(), upper_bound.end(), lower_bound.begin(),
53  [](const size_type l, const size_type r) { return l > r; }));
54  TA_ASSERT(std::equal(
55  upper_bound.begin(), upper_bound.end(), range.upbound_data(),
56  [](const size_type l, const size_type r) { return l <= r; }));
57 
58  // Initialize the block range data members
59  data_ = new size_type[range.rank() << 2];
60  offset_ = range.offset();
61  volume_ = 1ul;
62  rank_ = range.rank();
63  block_offset_ = 0ul;
64 
65  // Construct temp pointers
66  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const range_stride = range.stride_data();
67  using std::data;
68  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower_bound_ptr = data(lower_bound);
69  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper_bound_ptr = data(upper_bound);
70  auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
71  auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = lower + rank_;
72  auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const extent = upper + rank_;
73  auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = extent + rank_;
74 
75  // Compute range data
76  for (int i = int(rank_) - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
77  // Compute data for element i of lower, upper, and extent
78  const auto lower_bound_i = lower_bound_ptr[i];
79  const auto upper_bound_i = upper_bound_ptr[i];
80  const auto range_stride_i = range_stride[i];
81  const auto extent_i = upper_bound_i - lower_bound_i;
82 
83  // Check input dimensions
84  TA_ASSERT(lower_bound_i >= range.lobound(i));
85  TA_ASSERT(lower_bound_i < upper_bound_i);
86  TA_ASSERT(upper_bound_i <= range.upbound(i));
87 
88  // Set the block range data
89  lower[i] = lower_bound_i;
90  upper[i] = upper_bound_i;
91  extent[i] = extent_i;
92  stride[i] = range_stride_i;
93  block_offset_ += lower_bound_i * range_stride_i;
94  volume_ *= extent_i;
95  }
96  }
97 
98  public:
99  // Compiler generated functions
100  BlockRange() = default;
101  BlockRange(const BlockRange&) = default;
102  BlockRange(BlockRange&&) = default;
103  ~BlockRange() = default;
104  BlockRange& operator=(const BlockRange&) = default;
105  BlockRange& operator=(BlockRange&&) = default;
106 
107  template <typename Index>
108  BlockRange(const Range& range, const Index& lower_bound,
109  const Index& upper_bound)
110  : Range() {
111  init(range, lower_bound, upper_bound);
112  }
113 
114  BlockRange(const Range& range,
115  const std::initializer_list<size_type>& lower_bound,
116  const std::initializer_list<size_type>& upper_bound)
117  : Range() {
118  init(range, lower_bound, upper_bound);
119  }
120 
122 
128  template <
129  typename Index,
130  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_integral<Index>::value>::type* = nullptr>
131  ordinal_type ordinal(const Index& index) const {
132  return Range::ordinal(index);
133  }
134 
135  template <typename... Index,
136  typename std::enable_if<(sizeof...(Index) > 1ul)>::type* = nullptr>
137  ordinal_type ordinal(const Index&... index) const {
138  return Range::ordinal(index...);
139  }
140 
142 
148  ordinal_type ordinal(ordinal_type index) const {
149  // Check that index is contained by range.
150  TA_ASSERT(includes(index));
151 
152  // Construct result coordinate index object and allocate its memory.
153  ordinal_type result = 0ul;
154 
155  // Get pointers to the data
156  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const size = data_ + rank_ + rank_;
157  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = size + rank_;
158 
159  // Compute the coordinate index of o in range.
160  for (int i = int(rank_) - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
161  const auto size_i = size[i];
162  const auto stride_i = stride[i];
163 
164  // Compute result index element i
165  result += (index % size_i) * stride_i;
166  index /= size_i;
167  }
168 
169  return result + block_offset_ - offset_;
170  }
171 
173  template <typename Index>
174  BlockRange& resize(const Index&, const Index&) {
175  // This function is here to shadow the base class resize function
176  TA_EXCEPTION("BlockRange::resize() is not supported");
177  return *this;
178  }
179 
181 
184  template <typename Index>
185  Range_& inplace_shift(const Index&) {
186  TA_EXCEPTION("BlockRange::inplace_shift() is not supported");
187  return *this;
188  }
189 
191 
194  template <typename Index>
195  Range_ shift(const Index&) {
196  TA_EXCEPTION("BlockRange::shift() is not supported");
197  return *this;
198  }
199 
200  void swap(BlockRange& other) {
201  Range::swap(other);
202  std::swap(block_offset_, other.block_offset_);
203  }
204 
206  template <typename Archive>
207  void serialize(const Archive& ar) const {
208  Range::serialize(ar);
209  ar& block_offset_;
210  }
211 }; // BlockRange
212 
214 
218 inline bool is_congruent(const BlockRange& r1, const BlockRange& r2) {
219  return is_congruent(static_cast<const Range&>(r1),
220  static_cast<const Range&>(r2));
221 }
222 
224 
227 inline bool is_congruent(const BlockRange& r1, const Range& r2) {
228  return is_congruent(static_cast<const Range&>(r1), r2);
229 }
230 
232 
235 inline bool is_congruent(const Range& r1, const BlockRange& r2) {
236  return is_congruent(r2, r1);
237 }
238 
239 } // namespace TiledArray
